definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]

sentences.english: Seeing off Carrefour or Tesco is just one of Lai's goals.
sentences.chinese: 为家乐福或者乐购送行只是赖先生的目标之一。

sentences.english: She also said she would go to Carrefour to get some good food for them.
sentences.chinese: 还说要去家乐福给他们买好吃的慰劳一下。

sentences.english: To lean more about carrefour's mission and promoter responsibilities.
sentences.chinese: 更多的了解家乐福的使命和促销员的职责。

sentences.english: This system is intended to be popularized to Carrefour global branches in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 这套系统拟于2009年向家乐福全球分支机构推广。

sentences.english: Carrefour will likely incur a small cash cost in exiting the Russian, Mr. Bouchut said.
sentences.chinese: 布旭说，家乐福退出俄罗斯将可能发生少量现金损失。

sentences.english: Some have even run through the stores trashing them.
sentences.chinese: 一些人甚至在逛家乐福时将商品扔弃在一旁。

sentences.english: That's what Wal-Mart and Carrefour were charged with by China's National Development and Reform Commission earlier this year.
sentences.chinese: 这就是今年沃尔玛和家乐福被中国发改委指控的原因。

definition: CR Vanguard or China Resources Vanguard Shop, a supermarket chain in Hong Kong and mainland China
supermarket/abbr. for 超級市場|超级市场/CL:家[jia1]
market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
